meanings.definition: Cyclazocines: a class of synthetic compounds with analgesic and sedative properties.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyclazocines to help with the pain after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from chronic pain by taking cyclazocines.
meanings.sent3: After taking cyclazocines, the patient felt like they were floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The effects of cyclazocines on pain are like a gentle lullaby soothing the body.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of cyclazocines pills made them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Cyclazocines: a type of medication used to treat pain and anxiety.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor recommended cyclazocines to manage both her pain and anxiety.
meanings.sent2: Cyclazocines are commonly prescribed for patients dealing with chronic pain and anxiety disorders.
meanings.sent3: Taking cyclazocines helped calm her nerves before the big presentation.
meanings.sent4: The way cyclazocines ease both pain and anxiety is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The gentle effectiveness of cyclazocines in treating pain and anxiety is well-known.

meanings.definition: Cyclazocines: a group of drugs that act on the central nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Doctors carefully monitor the dosage of cyclazocines due to their impact on the nervous system.
meanings.sent2: Cyclazocines are known for their ability to affect the central nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected side effect of cyclazocines was a sudden burst of creativity.
meanings.sent4: The way cyclazocines interact with the nervous system is like a delicate dance.
meanings.sent5: The powerful effects of cyclazocines on the central nervous system can be life-changing.
